Package it.polimi.group03.domain

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bar
    This class will hold the configuration for all bars on the board, based on the IDs and Orientations (unique key).
    Bead
    This class represents a bead in the matrix (board), when a bead is added to a player, it's status is active by default.
    Game
    This class represents the game including players, bars, beads and the board itself.
    Player
    This class will define a player in the game and his beads added (using Player.addBead(Bead) to the game.
    Position
    This class supports the position of a bead in the matrix (board), using coordinates X (from 0 to 6) and Y (from 0 to 6).
    Statistics
    This class will store and update all the statistics of the game, such as, but not limited to: Number of games played.
    StatusMessage
    This class is used to hold more specific information about an action perform in the game.
